mention_address: "Beals Point Kiosk, American River Bike Trail, Granite Bay, Placer County, California, 95746, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Super easy to find and the campsites are well laid out and not on top of each other. We stayed in an outer loop site. There is a lot of poison oak. The bathrooms were clean and... read more
Beals point is a nice recreation area for kayaking, playing in the water, bbq on the grass. It is $12 to drive a car in, but if you are just going with minimal stuff you can walk... read more
Has a sandy beach, big area. Needs more grass areas. Boat launch for Jet skis, canoes, small craft would be great. Great place to picnic with family..
